title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for English Vocabulary Learning Based on Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Comprehension
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the highest-difficulty sentences provided by the recommendation system with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the correlation between word frequency, sentence length, and syntactic complexity through system-recommended sentence analysis.
Learners can store over 10 new vocabulary items per week in long-term memory over four weeks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
